DOC.brief_summary: This study do compare two commonly available type body contouring , VASER-Assisted Lipoplasty ( VAL ) Suction-Assisted Lipoplasty ( SAL ) , decide one procedure prefer patient and/or surgeon . Participants VAL one side body SAL opposite side .
DOC.brief_title: VASER-Assisted Lipoplasty Compared With Suction-Assisted Lipoplasty
DOC.criteria: give voluntary , sign informed consent accordance institutional policy age 1850 year old Be willing able appear schedule , postoperative visit doctor Have moderate good skin tone Have excess fatty tissue arm , medial thigh , lateral thigh , back extra tissue expect compose adipose tissue . Have body mass index 2030 Are nonsmoker age 18 age 50 undergoing boy contour reconstruction follow injury disease deem inappropriate candidate surgery due medical mental health reason concurrently treat investigational agent participate investigational study within 60 day prior surgery elect participate study
